hero.title: Hi, I'm Felix!
hero.p0: Full-stack wizard, AI enthusiast, software engineering aspirer
hero.des0: I'm a 4th year computer science student at the University of Waterloo. I specialize in SWE and Full-Stack Devlopment with interst in AI.
hero.des1: I enjoy working in efficient team environments to create high-quality and impactful code. My strongest tech stack includes Python, TypeScript and React
hero.des3: I am currently learning more about AI models and algorithms along wtih the relevant AI tech stack!

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my most favourite projects that I enjoyed coding and designing from scratch, both with a team and alone.

laddy.subtitle: Get better by solving problems
laddy.description: Web app selects and lets you solve algorithmic problems of your level by looking at your Codeforces rating.

nuopen.subtitle: Freshest ICPC competition
nuopen.description: Landing page for the largest open programming competition organized by Nazarbayev University students.

railwayz.subtitle: Samruk Hackathon Winner
railwayz.description: Accurate prediction of the number of railway carriages required for different routes. "Best Architecture" title among all teams. Project made by Janbyr Inc.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: These are the technologies I am familiar with. This list is always growing as I develop my career.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I had a great time at these companies. Hopefully I will be able to leave impactful code at your company too!

contact.title: Contact me!
contact.description: Shoot me a message! I appreciate you checking out my website especially since you've made it this far! I'd love to chat or hang out :D

citation.content: When life gives you lemons, you don't have to make lemonade
citation.author: Felix
